item.title: Psychology 103
item.description: SAID (Specific Adaptation to Imposed Demand) Patience is for losers. (If patience really is necessary it will be learned in the process) Your body is not a toy.

item.title: Psychology 102
item.description: Personal Psychology and Trauma You probably have trauma that is left to be processed. Therapy: Licensed individual pointing out patterns of thought and giving you the tools and language to become aware of your maladaptive behaviors.

item.title: Rhetoric 102
item.description: Optics are as important as the logic conveyed. Body Language Dress to impress - also a sort of respect for the occasion. Breathe Deeply Writing Clearly Speaking Clearly Applied Rhetoric: power Machiavellianism broadly works.

item.title: Economics 103
item.description: Risk vs Reward. Leverage + Accountability + genuine curiosity how to choose a job.

item.title: Economics 101
item.description: Incentives as desire. People respond to incentives Money is Freedom. It is the freedom to fulfill your desires to design a happier more enriching life. If you get bond to the money, then it is no longer serving its purpose.

item.description: SAID (Specific Adaptation to Imposed Demand) Patience is for losers. (If patience really is necessary it will be learned in the process) Your body is not a toy.

item.title: Philosophy 101
item.description: Why Philosophy? Philosophy = Philo + Sophia = love of truth. Fact: Pursuing the truth is not always aligned with evolutionary incentives (Psychology 101).
